topic.title: Bidirectional Text Support in Grid Mode

body.p: If you are editing documents employing a different text orientation, you can change the way the text is rendered and edited in the grid cells by using the shortcut to switch from the default left to right text orientation to the right to left orientation.This change applies only to the text from the cells, and not to the layout of the grid editor.
